Trial Featured Recent Video Category Start Free Trial CrowdTour 2026: Securing the AI Era Together December 19, 2025 | Gautam Mehandru | Agentic SOC The AI era is here — and it’s redefining cybersecurity. Organizations around the globe are adopting and operationalizing AI to drive innovation. At the same time, adversaries are embracing AI to increase the speed, scale, and sophistication of their attacks. In this time of transformation, there is a tremendous opportunity for industry experts to come together and learn from one another to understand how AI is reshaping security. This is what CrowdTour 2026 delivers. Now in its third year, CrowdStrike’s global cybersecurity roadshow brings executives, practitioners, architects, and innovators together to navigate the realities of AI-powered defense. CrowdStrike is uniting this community through expert guidance, training, and real-world experiences from defenders on the front lines. Across more than 60 cities worldwide, attendees will hear customer stories that ground AI security in practice and collaborate with their peers on strategies that stop breaches at machine speed. CrowdTour 2026 will give attendees a front-row seat to how leading organizations are transforming their SOCs and securing the systems that power modern business — and how they’re using the single, unified CrowdStrike Falcon® platform to do it. Outsmart Adversaries in the AI Era CrowdTour 2026 is built for security leaders and practitioners who want to strengthen their strategies and sharpen outcomes in a world driven by AI. Each event focuses on three defining themes for modern defense: Defeat the AI-accelerated adversary: Learn how attackers are using AI to accelerate and evolve, and see how to stay ahead of them through live demos, hands-on sessions, and expert insights. Improve outcomes with agentic SOC transformation: Discover how AI-powered automation is turning the SOC into an intelligent command center that unifies protection and streamlines workflows to deliver results at machine speed. Govern and secure AI across the attack surface: Learn how to protect data, agents, identities, and models from manipulation and misuse across the enterprise so you can safely innovate with AI. Together, these pillars define the challenges defenders face today — and the practical skills and strategies attendees will take home from CrowdTour. Participants will explore AI-native detection, response, and automation through expert content, frontline perspectives, and interactive sessions that align with the themes above. These sessions will provide actionable insights teams can bring back to their organizations. In addition, attendees can look forward to dedicated networking opportunities with peers, partners, and CrowdStrike experts. For many attendees, CrowdTour is just the beginning of their CrowdStrike journey. It’s a chance to learn, connect, and build momentum before the industry comes together later in the year at Fal.Con 2026 for the next evolution of ideas. Experience the Power of the Crowd The CrowdStrike community continues to grow, and we are scaling CrowdTour accordingly. CrowdTour 2026 will bring 60+ events to cities across North America, South America, META, Europe, and the Asia-Pacific region — more than double the number of events of CrowdTour 2025. CrowdTour, along with Fal.Con, is part of CrowdStrike’s marquee event programming, which brings education, industry expertise, and customer perspective that can’t be found anywhere else. From Singapore to São Paulo and London to Los Angeles, CrowdTour 2026 brings the Power of the Crowd to your doorstep. CrowdTour 2026 is where defenders gain the insights, experience, and connections to secure AI adoption, modernize security operations, and stay ahead of AI-driven adversaries. Join your peers and the CrowdStrike team as we continue leading cybersecurity in the AI era together. Find a CrowdTour 2026 stop near you and register today for your regional event.
